meaningMnemonic: My <kanji>warning</kanji> <kanji>commandment</kanji> is there to make sure you take <vocabulary>precaution</vocabulary> and show <vocabulary>vigilance</vocabulary> when it comes to that precaution. It's only a warning commandment, though, which is why it has to do with prevention and precaution.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
